titleStmt.title: Received the [blank] day of [blank] 1642 of [blank] the summe of [blank] towards the arming, maintaining, and paying of souldiers weekly for severall months ensuing, which money is to be repayed againe upon the publicke faith of the kingdome, with interest for the time, as appeareth by an ordinance of Parliament dated the 14 day of November, 1642.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Probably intended to accompany the text of the text of the ordinance mentioned (Wing E1364).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
